t = int(input())
while t:
    n = int(input())
    b = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    ans = sum(b)
    print('YES') if ans % 2 == 0 else print('NO')
    t -= 1

noOfTestCases = int(input())
for _ in range(noOfTestCases):
    N = int(input())
    print('YES') if sum(map(int, input().split())) % 2 == 0 else print('NO')
